name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior System Engineer with 13+ years of experience in systems development and administration, specializing in **Windows Server**, **Active Directory**, and **REST APIs**. Proficient in managing enterprise environments, with hands-on experience in **PowerShell** scripting for automation and system optimization. Adept at deploying and maintaining applications in compliance-driven frameworks, integrating enterprise solutions within **Exchange** environments. Strong multilingual communication skills in **German** and **English** complement my technical expertise, enabling effective collaboration in diverse teams. Proven track record in leveraging cloud services and development frameworks while implementing best practices in security and compliance.
